CustomField.description: Field for users to add text to pull into an email. The field was Conditional Letter Text and Provisional Letter Text in ERx and will apply more broadly in EDA.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field for users to add text to pull into an email. The field was Conditional Letter Text and Provisional Letter Text in ERx and will apply more broadly in EDA.
CustomField.label: Communication Merge Text Field
